messages.1000094552:
#wTransform into a #yDark Avenger#w. Jump and shoot dozens of fire blades to the ground, then descend as you spin and attack.
Keep pressing the #yRegular Attack Button#w after the first hit to keep hitting. The damage of the final hit will increase depending on how long you charge the skill.

#yCan also be used in the air.

#wSlash as you move forward, then deal two #yadditional hits.

#y(1st Additional Hit)
Regular Attack Button: #wSlash as you move forward.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wSlash as you spin in place.

#y(2nd Additional Hit)
Regular Attack: #wSlash and shove enemies back.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wHit enemies and launch them into the air.

messages.1000094543:
#wDraw your sword and take a stance.

#yRegular Attack Button: #wShoot a fast, explosive air blade.
#yBack Key + Regular Attack Button: #wShoot a slow air blade that will penetrate through an enemy and deal {0}% Damage.
#yForward Key: #wDash quickly.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wCancel the stance, detonate the slow air blade, and deal #y{1}x#w Damage.

#ySpecial Attack Button: #wEnd the attack with a whirl of fire.
